mapper.sql: a.cust_id AS "customs.id", soc.name as"customs.name", soc.parent_ids AS "customs.parentIds", a.center_id AS "centers.id", sox.name as "centers.name", a.consultant_id AS "consultants.id", sug.name as "consultants.name", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", suc.name as "createBy.name", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.status as "delFlag", suu.mobile as "consultants.mobile"

LEFT JOIN sys_office soc on soc.id=a.cust_id LEFT JOIN sys_office sox on sox.id=a.center_id LEFT JOIN sys_user suc on suc.id=a.create_id LEFT JOIN sys_user sug on sug.id=a.consultant_id and sug.status=1 LEFT JOIN sys_user suu on suu.company_id=soc.id and suu.status=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_custom_center_consultant( cust_id, center_id, consultant_id, create_time, create_id, update_id, status ) VALUES ( #{customs.id}, #{centers.id}, #{consultants.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_custom_center_consultant SET center_id = #{centers.id}, consultant_id = #{consultants.id}, update_time = #{updateDate}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, status=#{delFlag} WHERE cust_id = #{customs.id}
